# Box Plot Maker

> Free online box plot generator and statistical visualization tool. Create professional box and whisker plots instantly with automatic outlier detection, CSV upload, and PNG export. No signup required.

## Overview

Box Plot Maker is a browser-based statistical tool that helps students, researchers, and data analysts create box and whisker plots in seconds. All data processing happens locally in the browser for complete privacy.

## Core Features

- **Interactive Box Plot Generator**: Real-time visualization as you enter data
- **Automatic Outlier Detection**: Uses the standard 1.5Ã—IQR rule to identify unusual values
- **Multiple Input Methods**: Manual entry, copy-paste from Excel/Google Sheets, or CSV file upload
- **Five-Number Summary**: Automatically calculates min, Q1, median, Q3, max, and IQR
- **Export Options**: Download as PNG image or CSV file with full statistics
- **Privacy-First**: All calculations performed locally, no data sent to servers

## Key Pages

### Tool & Documentation
- Home: https://boxplotmaker.online - Main tool interface with data input and visualization
- How to Use: https://boxplotmaker.online#how-to-use - Step-by-step tutorial for creating box plots
- What is a Box Plot: https://boxplotmaker.online#what-is-box-plot - Educational guide explaining box plot components
- When to Use: https://boxplotmaker.online#when-to-use - Use cases for comparing groups, identifying outliers, checking data symmetry
- How to Read: https://boxplotmaker.online#how-to-read - Guide to interpreting box plots correctly

### Educational Content
- FAQ: https://boxplotmaker.online#faq - Common questions about box plots, CSV upload, outlier detection, data requirements
- Real-World Examples: https://boxplotmaker.online#examples - Applications in education, healthcare, business, and environmental science

### Legal & Privacy
- Privacy Policy: https://boxplotmaker.online/privacy - Data handling practices (no tracking, no cookies, local processing)
- Terms of Service: https://boxplotmaker.online/terms - Usage terms and user responsibilities

## Technical Implementation

Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Uses Chart.js for visualization. Fully responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Deployed on Vercel.

## Target Audience

- Students and teachers working on statistics assignments
- Researchers analyzing experimental data
- Data analysts comparing group performance
- Anyone needing quick statistical visualizations

## SEO Keywords

box plot maker, box and whisker plot generator, free box plot generator, online box plot maker, box plot calculator, five-number summary calculator, outlier detection tool, statistical visualization tool
